Package engine.forGUI

Class ChessboardTable

java.lang.Object
engine.forGUI.Chessboard
public class ChessboardTable extends Object
Represents and creates a GUI chess board.

The ChessboardTable class is responsible for managing the graphical user interface (GUI) of a chess board. It provides a visual representation of the chess board, handles user interactions, and updates the board state accordingly. The class utilizes various components such as JFrame, JPanel, and MouseListener to create and manage the GUI elements. It also interacts with other classes such as Board, Piece, and Move to handle game logic and data.
Author:
Aaron Ho
